All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractDAO<T>
Generic class used in order to access the mySQL database and create queries
AddClientView
Class used in order to model the GUI for adding a client
AddProductView
Class used in order to model the GUI for adding a product
Bill
This class represents a model for a Bill
BillBLL
This class is used in order to implement the business logic for Bill objects
BillDAO
Class used in order to access the mySQL database and create only Bill specific queries
Client
This class represents a model for a Client
ClientBLL
This class is used in order to implement the business logic for Client objects
ClientDAO
Class used in order to access the mySQL database and create only Client specific queries
ClientView
Class used in order to model the GUI for the Client operations
ConnectionFactory
This class is used in order to establish a connection to our MySQL database
EditClientView
Class used in order to model the GUI for editing a client
EditProductView
Class used in order to model the GUI for editing a product
MainView
Class used in order to model the GUI for the application
Order
This class represents a model for an Order
OrderBLL
This class is used in order to implement the business logic for Order objects
OrderDAO
Class used in order to access the mySQL database and create only Order specific queries
OrderView
Class used in order to model the GUI for creating a new order
Product
This class represents a model for a Product
ProductBLL
This class is used in order to implement the business logic for Product objects
ProductDAO
Class used in order to access the mySQL database and create only Product specific queries
ProductView
Class used in order to model the GUI for the Product operations

Class used in order to run the program
ViewClientsView
Class used in order to model the GUI for displaying all the existing clients
ViewProductsView
Class used in order to model the GUI for displaying all the existing products
